name: Project Memento
description:
*WARNING - MUSIC IS LOUD* Project Memento - V3.1 

Use the arrow keys to move

Enter to Start

Z to interact

(Known bugs and issues)

- Clicking enter restarts the game at any point of the game

- Some linguistic errors

(Thank you for pointing these out in the forms)

Brief description:

Welcome to Project memento, a horror game about a man with PTSD exploring a church, seeking to recover lost memories and find out why this place haunts him so much.

I wonder what lays inside this cursed place... Are you brave enough to explore it?

After playing, please answer this form and rate your experience

(3rd Test. Feel free to answer it again with your new feedback)

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfjmYxyQy2QgPiN1zeFKwJlwkefsTTIKWaug87D...

Developer notes: I would like to thank you all for commenting and testing our game! This was created in GBStudio as a project for Game Design class, however the positive feedback has encouraged us to give it a few more updates once we get more free time. Hopefully we will get a full experience with the entire map we had planned out and better sprite assets (To replace the "rocks" we had). Regardless, thank you so much for your support <3 Patch notes -

v3.1

 - Fixed the Spawn point so the player doesn't start at the end of the game.

v3

 - Bug fixes

     - Fixed the torch puzzle bug.

     - Fixed puzzles resetting after leaving a room, even though they were completed

 - Added outlines to collision areas

 - Added narrative at the start and at the end

 - Changed the priests table assets

v2

 - Bug fixes:

     - Fixed a bug with the chat box at the cross room, after all puzzles were completed

     - Fixed the Box puzzle, so it wouldn't seem like the player was soft locked

v1 - Game released
